import React from 'react' import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' function Text3() { const isTablet = useMediaQuery({ query: '(max-width: 1410px)'}) const isWideScreen = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-width: 1411px)'}) return (
{isWideScreen &&

Collaboration

We have decided to collaborate with many artists, associations and movements around the world to make each day even more unique and exceptional. Each day will be personalized by external actors, chosen from day to day by our team and the community. Just like the blockchain, the collaborations have no limits, ranging from independent artists to world famous artists, from public figures to associations... each day will be highlighted.

} {isTablet &&

We have decided to collaborate with many artists, associations and movements around the world to make each day even more unique and exceptional. Each day will be personalized by external actors, chosen from day to day by our team and the community. Just like the blockchain, the collaborations have no limits, ranging from independent artists to world famous artists, from public figures to associations... each day will be highlighted.

}
) } export default Text3
